00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_MAINTENANCEQUEUE_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_MAINTENANCEQUEUE_H

00025 #include <cassert>
00026 #include <queue>

00030 #include "Common/Mutex.h"
00031 #include "Common/Thread.h"

00034 #include "Common/ReferenceCount.h"

00036 #include "MaintenanceTask.h"
00037 
00038 namespace Hypertable {
00039 
00042   class MaintenanceQueue : public ReferenceCount {
00043 
00044     static bool             ms_pause;
00045     static boost::condition ms_cond;
00046 
00047     struct LtMaintenanceTask {
00048       bool
00049       operator()(const MaintenanceTask *sm1, const MaintenanceTask *sm2) const {
00050         return xtime_cmp(sm1->start_time, sm2->start_time) >= 0;
00051       }
00052     };
00053 
00054     typedef std::priority_queue<MaintenanceTask *,
00055             std::vector<MaintenanceTask *>, LtMaintenanceTask> TaskQueue;
00056 
00057     class MaintenanceQueueState {
00058     public:
00059       MaintenanceQueueState() : shutdown(false) { return; }
00060       TaskQueue          queue;
00061       Mutex              mutex;
00062       boost::condition   cond;
00063       bool               shutdown;
00064     };
00065 
00066     class Worker {
00067 
00068     public:
00069 
00070       Worker(MaintenanceQueueState &state) : m_state(state) { return; }
00071 
00072       void operator()() {
00073         boost::xtime now, next_work;
00074         MaintenanceTask *task = 0;
00075 
00076         while (true) {
00077 
00078           {
00079             ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00080 
00081             boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00082 
00083             while (m_state.queue.empty() ||
00084                    xtime_cmp((m_state.queue.top())->start_time, now) > 0) {
00085 
00086               if (m_state.shutdown)
00087                 return;
00088 
00089               if (m_state.queue.empty())
00090                 m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00091               else {
00092                 next_work = (m_state.queue.top())->start_time;
00093                 m_state.cond.timed_wait(lock, next_work);
00094               }
00095               boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00096             }
00097 
00098             task = m_state.queue.top();
00099             m_state.queue.pop();
00100           }
00101 
00102           try {
00103 
00104             // maybe pause
00105             {
00106               ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00107               while (ms_pause)
00108                 ms_cond.wait(lock);
00109             }
00110 
00111             task->execute();
00112           }
00113           catch(Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00114             HT_ERRORF("%s (%s)", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00115           }
00116 
00117           delete task;
00118         }
00119       }
00120 
00121     private:
00122       MaintenanceQueueState &m_state;
00123     };
00124 
00125     MaintenanceQueueState  m_state;
00126     ThreadGroup            m_threads;
00127     bool joined;
00128 
00129   public:
00130 
00137     MaintenanceQueue(int worker_count) : joined(false) {
00138       Worker Worker(m_state);
00139       assert (worker_count > 0);
00140       for (int i=0; i<worker_count; ++i)
00141         m_threads.create_thread(Worker);
00142       //threads
00143     }
00144 
00150     void shutdown() {
00151       m_state.shutdown = true;
00152       m_state.cond.notify_all();
00153     }
00154 
00159     void join() {
00160       if (!joined) {
00161         m_threads.join_all();
00162         joined = true;
00163       }
00164     }
00165 
00169     void stop() {
00170       ms_pause = true;
00171     }
00172 
00176     void start() {
00177       ms_pause = false;
00178       ms_cond.notify_all();
00179     }
00180 
00188     void add(MaintenanceTask *task) {
00189       ScopedLock lock(m_state.mutex);
00190       m_state.queue.push(task);
00191       m_state.cond.notify_one();
00192     }
00193   };
00194 
00195   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<MaintenanceQueue> MaintenanceQueuePtr;
00196 
00197 } // namespace Hypertable
